object.name: unpinAllChatMessages
object.description: Use this method to clear the list of pinned messages in a chat. In private chats and channel direct messages chats, no additional rights are required to unpin all pinned messages. Conversely, the bot must be an administrator with the 'can_pin_messages' right or the 'can_edit_messages' right to unpin all pinned messages in groups and channels respectively. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to clear the list of pinned messages in a chat. In private chats and channel direct messages chats, no additional rights are required to unpin all pinned messages. Conversely, the bot must be an administrator with the 'can_pin_messages' right or the 'can_edit_messages' right to unpin all pinned messages in groups and channels respectively. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to clear the list of pinned messages in a chat. In private chats and channel direct messages chats, no additional rights are required to unpin all pinned messages. Conversely, the bot must be an administrator with the 'can_pin_messages' right or the 'can_edit_messages' right to unpin all pinned messages in groups and channels respectively. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)

annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
